channel.title: Comments on: More Humorous TV Commercials: TBS & G4

item.title: By: Evan Eickmeyer
item.dc:creator: Evan Eickmeyer
item.description: <a href="http://www.slate.com/id/2143810/" rel="nofollow">"Mac Attack: Apple's mean-spirited new ad campaign,"</a> is about TV commercials that Apple thought were humorous. More humorous, however, is the referenced "href="http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=36099539665548298">joke video</a> -- actually created by Microsoft employees -- that envisions what might happen if Microsoft redesigned the iPod's packaging."
item.content:encoded: “Mac Attack: Apple’s mean-spirited new ad campaign,” is about TV commercials that Apple thought were humorous. More humorous, however, is the referenced “href=”http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=36099539665548298”>joke video — actually created by Microsoft employees — that envisions what might happen if Microsoft redesigned the iPod’s packaging.”
